com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.style.layers

Class SymbolLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.style.layers.Layer
      • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.style.layers.SymbolLayer

  • @UiThread
public class SymbolLayer
extends Layer
    An icon or a text label.
    See Also:
